name: habitat-suitability-model-03_download_environment
label: Habitat Suitability Model 03 - Download Environment
description: Download the environmental variables from CMEMS using the CopernicuMarine toolbox via python.

parameters.name: copernicusmarine_username
parameters.label: copernicusmarine_username
parameters.description: Username for Copernicus Marine Environment Monitoring Service

parameters.name: copernicusmarine_password
parameters.label: copernicusmarine_password
parameters.description: Password for Copernicus Marine Environment Monitoring Service

inputs.name: input
inputs.label: input
inputs.description: zip file containing the setup information, temporal_extent and study_area_file

outputs.name: output
outputs.label: output zip
outputs.description: zip file containing the RDS files with the occurrences of the species in the study area, the overview of datasets and the study area
